articles.title: Europeans evacuated from Niger as neighboring West African juntas warn against intervention - CNN
articles.description: Hundreds of European nationals are being evacuated from Niger in the wake of a military coup that has plunged the West African nation into a political crisis and rattled the region.
articles.content:
Hundreds of European nationals are being evacuated from Niger in the wake of a military coup that has plunged the West African nation into a political crisis and rattled the region.

articles.title: DeSantis on why he's standing his ground against VP Harris: 'It's wrong to let false narratives stand' - Fox News
articles.description: Gov. Ron DeSantis says he is "ready to roll" when it comes to debating Vice President Harris in a controversy over a line in Florida's new African-American history curriculum.
